document_data.title: Settlement
document_data.name: Great Raven Pueblo
document_data.mainbody: '''Great Raven Pueblo''' was a [[human]] settlement in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.Geography: The Great Raven Pueblo was located on the north shore of the Pasocada River at the Raven Falls. Just north of it rose the sheer walls of [[Mesa Bovara]]. A few miles downriver from it was the [[Metahel]] settlement of [[Lomaraj]]. Stairs were carved from the Pueblo to the bottom of the cliff beside the falls, marking the border between the [[Azuposi]] and Metahel territories.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Great Raven Pueblo was an Azuposi settlement with a population of around 900 people. Much of the trade with the Metahel people flowed through it.
